name: Clicker Game (IDK_ORG)
description:
Free clicker with the essence

Browser game on the topic of "Clicker".

If you like such games, then here you keep it.

Clicker Store
Clicker Information

For leveling tiers, you get $. You can also upgrade all tiers at once, but do not buy if you do not have a tier. There are also coins here for which you can buy Everything++. And you get coins for completing achievements.

A simple but interesting game.

I hope you like it!
